name: Unity Special Mother's Day Project - Bubble Shooter
name_original: Unity Special Mother's Day Project - Bubble Shooter
description:
PC: Aim with the Mouse and shoot with the Left Mouse Button.

Mobile: Aim and shoot by tapping anywhere on the screen.

Note:

The two bubbles on the bubble shooter exchange every few seconds (indicated by the transparency of the diamond), act fast!

You gain more points for every wall bounce / projectile collision, cool!

You win by shooting bubbles at bubbles with the same color and gradually unlocking the hidden message!! (It's pretty obvious what the message is ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) )

You lose if the bubbles reach the bubble shooter!

P.S. HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY!!!
